text: Episodes is an Anglo-American television sitcom. It began on January 9, 2011 and is set in Los Angeles, California. It was created by David Crane and Jeffrey Klarik. It is directed by James Griffiths and Jim Field Smith. It stars Matt LeBlanc, Stephen Mangan, Tamsin Grieg, John Pankow, Kathleen Rose Perkins and Mircea Monroe. Mangan and Grieg play Sean and Beverly lincon a British married couple who travel to Hollywood to remake their successful British TV series. LeBlanc is recruited to play the protagonist in the American remake. == Other websites == * Category:2011 American television series debuts Category:2010s American television series Category:2010s British television series Category:American sitcoms Category:British sitcoms Category:Television series set in Los Angeles Category:2011 British television series debuts Category:English-language television programs
title: Episodes (TV series)
